    id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True, index=True)
    name = Column(String, nullable=False)
    email = Column(String, nullable=False, unique=True)
    notes = Column(Text, nullable=True)
</action>

Creating backend service files for contacts, tags, campaigns, and email sending:

<action type="file" filePath="backend/services/contact_service.py">
from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends, HTTPException
from sqlalchemy.orm import Session
from db_config import get_db
from database.contact import Contact
from models.crm_models import ContactCreate, ContactRead
from typing import List

router = APIRouter(prefix="/contacts", tags=["contacts"])

@router.post("/", response_model=ContactRead)
def create_contact(contact: ContactCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    db_contact = Contact(**contact.model_dump())
    db.add(db_contact)
    db.commit()
    db.refresh(db_contact)
    print(f"Contact created: {db_contact.email}")
    return db_contact

@router.get("/", response_model=List[ContactRead])
def list_contacts(db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    contacts = db.query(Contact).all()
    print(f"Fetched {len(contacts)} contacts")
    return contacts

@router.get("/{contact_id}/", response_model=ContactRead)
def get_contact(contact_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    contact = db.query(Contact).filter(Contact.id == contact_id).first()
    if not contact:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Contact not found")
    print(f"Fetched contact: {contact.email}")
    return contact
</action>

from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends, HTTPException
from sqlalchemy.orm import Session
from db_config import get_db
from database.tag import Tag
from models.crm_models import TagCreate, TagRead
from typing import List

router = APIRouter(prefix="/tags", tags=["tags"])

@router.post("/", response_model=TagRead)
def create_tag(tag: TagCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    db_tag = Tag(**tag.model_dump())
    db.add(db_tag)
    db.commit()
    db.refresh(db_tag)
    print(f"Tag created: {db_tag.name}")
    return db_tag

@router.get("/", response_model=List[TagRead])
def list_tags(db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    tags = db.query(Tag).all()
    print(f"Fetched {len(tags)} tags")
    return tags

@router.get("/{tag_id}/", response_model=TagRead)
def get_tag(tag_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    tag = db.query(Tag).filter(Tag.id == tag_id).first()
    if not tag:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Tag not found")
    print(f"Fetched tag: {tag.name}")
    return tag
</action>

<action type="file" filePath="backend/services/email_service.py">
from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends, HTTPException
from sqlalchemy.orm import Session
from db_config import get_db
from database.email import Email
from database.contact import Contact
from database.campaign import Campaign
from models.crm_models import EmailCreate, EmailRead
from typing import List
from datetime import datetime

router = APIRouter(prefix="/emails", tags=["emails"])

@router.post("/", response_model=EmailRead)
def send_email(email: EmailCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    contact = db.query(Contact).filter(Contact.id == email.to_contact_id).first()
    if not contact:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Contact not found")
    campaign = None
    if email.campaign_id:
        campaign = db.query(Campaign).filter(Campaign.id == email.campaign_id).first()
        if not campaign:
            raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Campaign not found")
    db_email = Email(
        to_contact_id=email.to_contact_id,
        campaign_id=email.campaign_id,
        subject=email.subject,
        body=email.body,
        sent_at=datetime.utcnow()
    )
    db.add(db_email)
    db.commit()
    db.refresh(db_email)
    print(f"Email sent to: {contact.email} (subject: {email.subject})")
    return db_email

@router.get("/", response_model=List[EmailRead])
def list_emails(db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    emails = db.query(Email).all()
    print(f"Fetched {len(emails)} emails")
    return emails

@router.get("/{email_id}/", response_model=EmailRead)
def get_email(email_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    email = db.query(Email).filter(Email.id == email_id).first()
    if not email:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Email not found")
    print(f"Fetched email: {email.subject}")
    return email
</action>

import requests
from db_config import Base, get_db, engine
from fastapi.testclient import TestClient
from app import app

def test_create_tables():
    print("Creating all tables...")
    Base.metadata.create_all(bind=engine)
    print("Tables created successfully.")

def test_api_endpoints():
    client = TestClient(app)
    endpoints = [
        ("/contacts/", "GET"),
        ("/tags/", "GET"),
        ("/campaigns/", "GET"),
        ("/emails/", "GET"),
    ]
    for url, method in endpoints:
        response = client.request(method, url)
        print(f"Testing {method} {url}: Status {response.status_code}")
        assert response.status_code == 200

if __name__ == "__main__":
    test_create_tables()
    test_api_endpoints()
    print("Backend setup test completed.")
</action>

<action type="file" filePath="backend/test_backend_api.py">
import os
import requests

BASE_URL = os.environ.get("BACKEND_URL", "http://localhost:8002")

def test_contacts():
    contact_data = {"name": "Alice Smith", "email": "alice@example.com", "notes": "VIP"}
    r = requests.post(f"{BASE_URL}/contacts/", json=contact_data)
    print("Create Contact:", r.status_code, r.json())
    contact_id = r.json().get("id")
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE_URL}/contacts/{contact_id}/")
    print("Get Contact:", r.status_code, r.json())

def test_tags():
    tag_data = {"name": "Premium"}
    r = requests.post(f"{BASE_URL}/tags/", json=tag_data)
    print("Create Tag:", r.status_code, r.json())
    tag_id = r.json().get("id")
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE_URL}/tags/{tag_id}/")
    print("Get Tag:", r.status_code, r.json())

def test_campaigns():
    campaign_data = {"name": "Summer Sale", "subject": "Hot Deals!", "body": "Check out our summer offers."}
    r = requests.post(f"{BASE_URL}/campaigns/", json=campaign_data)
    print("Create Campaign:", r.status_code, r.json())
    campaign_id = r.json().get("id")
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE_URL}/campaigns/{campaign_id}/")
    print("Get Campaign:", r.status_code, r.json())
    return campaign_id

def test_emails(contact_id, campaign_id):
    email_data = {
        "to_contact_id": contact_id,
        "campaign_id": campaign_id,
        "subject": "Special Offer",
        "body": "Hello Alice, enjoy our premium deals!"
    }
    r = requests.post(f"{BASE_URL}/emails/", json=email_data)
    print("Send Email:", r.status_code, r.json())
    email_id = r.json().get("id")
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE_URL}/emails/{email_id}/")
    print("Get Email:", r.status_code, r.json())

if __name__ == "__main__":
    test_contacts()
    test_tags()
    campaign_id = test_campaigns()
    # Get contact ID for email test
    contact_resp = requests.get(f"{BASE_URL}/contacts/")
    contact_id = contact_resp.json()[0]["id"]
    test_emails(contact_id, campaign_id)
</action>

from dotenv import load_dotenv
load_dotenv()

import os
import requests

BASE_URL = os.environ.get("BACKEND_URL", "http://localhost:8002")

def test_contacts():
    contact_data = {"name": "Alice Smith", "email": "alice@example.com", "notes": "VIP"}
    r = requests.post(f"{BASE_URL}/contacts/", json=contact_data)
    print("Create Contact:", r.status_code, r.json())
    contact_id = r.json().get("id")
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE_URL}/contacts/{contact_id}/")
    print("Get Contact:", r.status_code, r.json())

def test_tags():
    tag_data = {"name": "Premium"}
    r = requests.post(f"{BASE_URL}/tags/", json=tag_data)
    print("Create Tag:", r.status_code, r.json())
    tag_id = r.json().get("id")
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE_URL}/tags/{tag_id}/")
    print("Get Tag:", r.status_code, r.json())

def test_campaigns():
    campaign_data = {"name": "Summer Sale", "subject": "Hot Deals!", "body": "Check out our summer offers."}
    r = requests.post(f"{BASE_URL}/campaigns/", json=campaign_data)
    print("Create Campaign:", r.status_code, r.json())
    campaign_id = r.json().get("id")
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE_URL}/campaigns/{campaign_id}/")
    print("Get Campaign:", r.status_code, r.json())
    return campaign_id

def test_emails(contact_id, campaign_id):
    email_data = {
        "to_contact_id": contact_id,
        "campaign_id": campaign_id,
        "subject": "Special Offer",
        "body": "Hello Alice, enjoy our premium deals!"
    }
    r = requests.post(f"{BASE_URL}/emails/", json=email_data)
    print("Send Email:", r.status_code, r.json())
    email_id = r.json().get("id")
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE_URL}/emails/{email_id}/")
    print("Get Email:", r.status_code, r.json())

if __name__ == "__main__":
    test_contacts()
    test_tags()
    campaign_id = test_campaigns()
    # Get contact ID for email test
    contact_resp = requests.get(f"{BASE_URL}/contacts/")
    contact_id = contact_resp.json()[0]["id"]
    test_emails(contact_id, campaign_id)
</action>

import ContactsPage from './pages/ContactsPage';
import TagsPage from './pages/TagsPage';
import CampaignsPage from './pages/CampaignsPage';
import EmailPage from './pages/EmailPage';

function App() {
  return (
    <Router>
      <Box minH="100vh" bg="gray.50">

                Tags
              </Button>
              <Button as={Link} to="/campaigns" colorScheme="orange" variant="ghost">

              </Button>
              <Button as={Link} to="/email" colorScheme="teal" variant="ghost">

}

from typing import Optional, List
from datetime import datetime

class ContactBase(BaseModel):
    name: str
    email: str

class ContactCreate(ContactBase):

        from_attributes = True

class CampaignBase(BaseModel):

    subject: str
    body: str

    id: int
    created_at: Optional[datetime] = None
    class Config:
        from_attributes = True

class EmailBase(BaseModel):

from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends, HTTPException
from sqlalchemy.orm import Session
from db_config import get_db
from database.contact import Contact
from models.crm_models import ContactCreate, ContactRead
from typing import List

router = APIRouter(prefix="/contacts", tags=["contacts"])

@router.post("/", response_model=ContactRead)
def create_contact(contact: ContactCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    db_contact = Contact(**contact.model_dump())
    db.add(db_contact)
    db.commit()
    db.refresh(db_contact)
    print(f"Contact created: {db_contact.email}")
    return db_contact

@router.get("/", response_model=List[ContactRead])
def list_contacts(db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    contacts = db.query(Contact).all()
    print(f"Fetched {len(contacts)} contacts")
    return contacts

@router.get("/{contact_id}/", response_model=ContactRead)
def get_contact(contact_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    contact = db.query(Contact).filter(Contact.id == contact_id).first()
    if not contact:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Contact not found")
    print(f"Fetched contact: {contact.email}")
    return contact
</action>

<action type="file" filePath="backend/services/email_service.py">
from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends, HTTPException
from sqlalchemy.orm import Session
from db_config import get_db
from database.email import Email
from database.contact import Contact
from database.campaign import Campaign
from models.crm_models import EmailCreate, EmailRead
from typing import List
from datetime import datetime

router = APIRouter(prefix="/emails", tags=["emails"])

@router.post("/", response_model=EmailRead)
def send_email(email: EmailCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    contact = db.query(Contact).filter(Contact.id == email.to_contact_id).first()
    if not contact:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Contact not found")
    campaign = None
    if email.campaign_id:
        campaign = db.query(Campaign).filter(Campaign.id == email.campaign_id).first()
        if not campaign:
            raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Campaign not found")
    db_email = Email(
        to_contact_id=email.to_contact_id,
        campaign_id=email.campaign_id,
        subject=email.subject,
        body=email.body,
        sent_at=datetime.utcnow()
    )
    db.add(db_email)
    db.commit()
    db.refresh(db_email)
    print(f"Email sent to: {contact.email} (subject: {email.subject})")
    return db_email

@router.get("/", response_model=List[EmailRead])
def list_emails(db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    emails = db.query(Email).all()
    print(f"Fetched {len(emails)} emails")
    return emails

@router.get("/{email_id}/", response_model=EmailRead)
def get_email(email_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    email = db.query(Email).filter(Email.id == email_id).first()
    if not email:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Email not found")
    print(f"Fetched email: {email.subject}")
    return email
</action>

import requests
from db_config import Base, get_db, engine
from fastapi.testclient import TestClient
from app import app

def test_create_tables():
    print("Creating all tables...")
    Base.metadata.create_all(bind=engine)
    print("Tables created successfully.")

def test_api_endpoints():
    client = TestClient(app)
    endpoints = [
        ("/contacts/", "GET"),
        ("/tags/", "GET"),
        ("/campaigns/", "GET"),
        ("/emails/", "GET"),
    ]
    for url, method in endpoints:
        response = client.request(method, url)
        print(f"Testing {method} {url}: Status {response.status_code}")
        assert response.status_code == 200

if __name__ == "__main__":
    test_create_tables()
    test_api_endpoints()
    print("Backend setup test completed.")
</action>

import os
import requests

BASE_URL = os.environ.get("BACKEND_URL", "http://localhost:8002")

def test_contacts():
    contact_data = {"name": "Alice Smith", "email": "alice@example.com", "notes": "VIP"}
    r = requests.post(f"{BASE_URL}/contacts/", json=contact_data)
    print("Create Contact:", r.status_code, r.json())
    contact_id = r.json().get("id")
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE_URL}/contacts/{contact_id}/")
    print("Get Contact:", r.status_code, r.json())

def test_tags():
    tag_data = {"name": "Premium"}
    r = requests.post(f"{BASE_URL}/tags/", json=tag_data)
    print("Create Tag:", r.status_code, r.json())
    tag_id = r.json().get("id")
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE_URL}/tags/{tag_id}/")
    print("Get Tag:", r.status_code, r.json())

def test_campaigns():
    campaign_data = {"name": "Summer Sale", "subject": "Hot Deals!", "body": "Check out our summer offers."}
    r = requests.post(f"{BASE_URL}/campaigns/", json=campaign_data)
    print("Create Campaign:", r.status_code, r.json())
    campaign_id = r.json().get("id")
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE_URL}/campaigns/{campaign_id}/")
    print("Get Campaign:", r.status_code, r.json())
    return campaign_id

def test_emails(contact_id, campaign_id):
    email_data = {
        "to_contact_id": contact_id,
        "campaign_id": campaign_id,
        "subject": "Special Offer",
        "body": "Hello Alice, enjoy our premium deals!"
    }
    r = requests.post(f"{BASE_URL}/emails/", json=email_data)
    print("Send Email:", r.status_code, r.json())
    email_id = r.json().get("id")
    r = requests.get(f"{BASE_URL}/emails/{email_id}/")
    print("Get Email:", r.status_code, r.json())

if __name__ == "__main__":
    test_contacts()
    test_tags()
    campaign_id = test_campaigns()
    # Get contact ID for email test
    contact_resp = requests.get(f"{BASE_URL}/contacts/")
    contact_id = contact_resp.json()[0]["id"]
    test_emails(contact_id, campaign_id)

import { Contact, Tag, Campaign, Email } from '../types/crm_types';

const API_URL = import.meta.env.VITE_API_URL || 'http://localhost:8002';

export async function getContacts(): Promise<Contact[]> {
  const res = await fetch(`${API_URL}/contacts/`);
  if (!res.ok) throw new Error('Failed to fetch contacts');
  return await res.json();
}

export async function createContact(data: Omit<Contact, 'id'>): Promise<Contact> {
  const res = await fetch(`${API_URL}/contacts/`, {
    method: 'POST',
    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
    body: JSON.stringify(data),
  });
  if (!res.ok) throw new Error('Failed to create contact');
  return await res.json();
}

export async function getTags(): Promise<Tag[]> {
  const res = await fetch(`${API_URL}/tags/`);
  if (!res.ok) throw new Error('Failed to fetch tags');
  return await res.json();
}

export async function createTag(data: Omit<Tag, 'id'>): Promise<Tag> {
  const res = await fetch(`${API_URL}/tags/`, {
    method: 'POST',
    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
    body: JSON.stringify(data),
  });
  if (!res.ok) throw new Error('Failed to create tag');
  return await res.json();
}

export async function getCampaigns(): Promise<Campaign[]> {
  const res = await fetch(`${API_URL}/campaigns/`);
  if (!res.ok) throw new Error('Failed to fetch campaigns');
  return await res.json();
}

export async function createCampaign(data: Omit<Campaign, 'id' | 'created_at'>): Promise<Campaign> {
  const res = await fetch(`${API_URL}/campaigns/`, {
    method: 'POST',
    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
    body: JSON.stringify(data),
  });
  if (!res.ok) throw new Error('Failed to create campaign');
  return await res.json();
}

export async function getEmails(): Promise<Email[]> {
  const res = await fetch(`${API_URL}/emails/`);
  if (!res.ok) throw new Error('Failed to fetch emails');
  return await res.json();
}

export async function sendEmail(data: Omit<Email, 'id' | 'sent_at'>): Promise<Email> {
  const res = await fetch(`${API_URL}/emails/`, {
    method: 'POST',
    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
    body: JSON.stringify(data),
  });
  if (!res.ok) throw new Error('Failed to send email');
  return await res.json();
}

<action type="file" filePath="frontend/src/pages/ContactsPage.tsx">
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react";
import { Box, Heading, VStack, HStack, Button, Input, Text, Spinner, useToast, Badge } from "@chakra-ui/react";
import { AddIcon } from "@chakra-ui/icons";
import { Contact, Tag } from "../types/crm_types";
import { getContacts, createContact, getTags } from "../api/crm_api";

const ContactsPage: React.FC = () => {
  const [contacts, setContacts] = useState<Contact[]>([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [name, setName] = useState("");
  const [email, setEmail] = useState("");
  const [notes, setNotes] = useState("");
  const [tags, setTags] = useState<Tag[]>([]);
  const toast = useToast();

  useEffect(() => {
    getContacts()
      .then(setContacts)
      .finally(() => setLoading(false));
    getTags().then(setTags);
  }, []);

  const handleAddContact = async () => {
    if (!name || !email) {
      toast({ title: "Name and Email required", status: "error" });
      return;
    }
    try {
      const newContact = await createContact({ name, email, notes });
      setContacts([...contacts, newContact]);
      setName("");
      setEmail("");
      setNotes("");
      toast({ title: "Contact added", status: "success" });
    } catch (e: any) {
      toast({ title: e.message, status: "error" });
    }
  };

  return (
    <Box p={6}>
      <Heading mb={4}>Contacts</Heading>
      <VStack spacing={4} align="stretch">
        <Box>
          <HStack>
            <Input placeholder="Name" value={name} onChange={e => setName(e.target.value)} />
            <Input placeholder="Email" value={email} onChange={e => setEmail(e.target.value)} />
            <Input placeholder="Notes" value={notes} onChange={e => setNotes(e.target.value)} />
            <Button leftIcon={<AddIcon />} colorScheme="blue" onClick={handleAddContact}>
              Add Contact
            </Button>
          </HStack>
        </Box>
        {loading ? (
          <Spinner />
        ) : contacts.length === 0 ? (
          <Text>No contacts found.</Text>
        ) : (
          contacts.map(contact => (
            <Box key={contact.id} p={3} borderWidth={1} borderRadius="md">
              <HStack justify="space-between">
                <Box>
                  <Text fontWeight="bold">{contact.name}</Text>
                  <Text>{contact.email}</Text>
                  {contact.notes && <Badge colorScheme="green">{contact.notes}</Badge>}
                </Box>
              </HStack>
            </Box>
          ))
        )}
      </VStack>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default ContactsPage;
</action>

import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react";

  const [subject, setSubject] = useState("");

<action type="file" filePath="frontend/src/pages/EmailPage.tsx">
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react";
import {
  Box,
  Heading,
  VStack,
  HStack,
  Button,
  Input,
  Text,
  Spinner,
  useToast,
  Select,
  Textarea,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";
import { Email, Contact, Campaign } from "../types/crm_types";
import { getContacts, getCampaigns, sendEmail, getEmails } from "../api/crm_api";

const EmailPage: React.FC = () => {
  const [contacts, setContacts] = useState<Contact[]>([]);
  const [campaigns, setCampaigns] = useState<Campaign[]>([]);
  const [emails, setEmails] = useState<Email[]>([]);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [toContactId, setToContactId] = useState<number | "">("");
  const [campaignId, setCampaignId] = useState<number | "">("");
  const [subject, setSubject] = useState("");
  const [body, setBody] = useState("");
  const toast = useToast();

  useEffect(() => {
    Promise.all([getContacts(), getCampaigns(), getEmails()])
      .then(([contacts, campaigns, emails]) => {
        setContacts(contacts);
        setCampaigns(campaigns);
        setEmails(emails);
      })
      .finally(() => setLoading(false));
  }, []);

  const handleSendEmail = async () => {
    if (!toContactId || !subject || !body) {
      toast({ title: "Contact, Subject, and Body required", status: "error" });
      return;
    }
    try {
      const newEmail = await sendEmail({
        to_contact_id: Number(toContactId),
        campaign_id: campaignId ? Number(campaignId) : undefined,
        subject,
        body,
      });
      setEmails([...emails, newEmail]);
      setToContactId("");
      setCampaignId("");
      setSubject("");
      setBody("");
      toast({ title: "Email sent", status: "success" });
    } catch (e: any) {
      toast({ title: e.message, status: "error" });
    }
  };

  return (
    <Box p={6}>
      <Heading mb={4}>Send Email</Heading>
      <VStack spacing={4} align="stretch">
        <Box>
          <HStack>
            <Select
              placeholder="Select contact"
              value={toContactId}
              onChange={e => setToContactId(e.target.value ? Number(e.target.value) : "")}
            >
              {contacts.map(contact => (
                <option key={contact.id} value={contact.id}>
                  {contact.name} ({contact.email})
                </option>
              ))}
            </Select>
            <Select
              placeholder="Select campaign (optional)"
              value={campaignId}
              onChange={e => setCampaignId(e.target.value ? Number(e.target.value) : "")}
            >
              {campaigns.map(campaign => (
                <option key={campaign.id} value={campaign.id}>
                  {campaign.name}
                </option>
              ))}
            </Select>
            <Input
              placeholder="Subject"
              value={subject}
              onChange={e => setSubject(e.target.value)}
            />
            <Textarea
              placeholder="Body"
              value={body}
              onChange={e => setBody(e.target.value)}
            />
            <Button colorScheme="teal" onClick={handleSendEmail}>
              Send Email
            </Button>
          </HStack>
        </Box>
        <Heading size="md" mt={6}>Sent Emails</Heading>
        {loading ? (
          <Spinner />
        ) : emails.length === 0 ? (
          <Text>No emails sent yet.</Text>
        ) : (
          emails.map(email => (
            <Box key={email.id} p={3} borderWidth={1} borderRadius="md">
              <Text fontWeight="bold">To: {contacts.find(c => c.id === email.to_contact_id)?.name || email.to_contact_id}</Text>
              <Text>Subject: {email.subject}</Text>
              <Text>Body: {email.body}</Text>
              <Text fontSize="sm" color="gray.500">
                Sent: {email.sent_at ? new Date(email.sent_at).toLocaleString() : ""}
              </Text>
              {email.campaign_id && (
                <Text fontSize="sm" color="orange.500">
                  Campaign: {campaigns.find(c => c.id === email.campaign_id)?.name || email.campaign_id}
                </Text>
              )}
            </Box>
          ))
        )}
      </VStack>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default EmailPage;
</action>
